#summary A list of compatible components which can be used in homebrew projects

= Introduction =

In order to build hardware to interact with the Home Easy devices, you will need suitable 433Mhz RF Transmitters / Receivers.  The following are items which have found to be compatible :

== Transmitters ==
 * Quasar [http://uk.rs-online.com/web/search/searchBrowseAction.html?method=getProduct&R=6172072 QAM-TX1]
 * AM-RT4 ([http://www.maplin.co.uk/module.aspx?moduleno=22965 Maplins VY48])
== Receivers ==
 * Quasar [http://uk.rs-online.com/web/search/searchBrowseAction.html?method=getProduct&R=6172050 QAM-RX4]
 * AM-HRR3 ([http://www.maplin.co.uk/module.aspx?moduleno=22965 Maplins VY48])
